website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use coffee machine that brews now or later, up to five cups at a time.
pros: Pause brewing to grab a quick cup
Water window helps you prevent overflow and control strength
Filter basket is removable for easy cleaning
One of the least-expensive coffee makers available
cons: Plastic machine is less durable and attractive than other models

customer_reviews.title: Would have been a great little machine if it kept working.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this coffeemaker when I first got it (In February - it is now May). Over the last week when I go to brew, the coffee hasn't been brewing right and I went to clean the coffee maker itself. There'[s a little pipe where the heated water comes out and goes into the basket, and it is BROKEN OFF. I have no kids and pets - I set this machine up at night to brew in the morning. How did it break? Warranty and support ended mid April. I'm SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee CGX& 5-Cup Progammable
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive. Found it at Walmart for approximately $17.50. Cost too much to send back so I am keeping it unless it is defective...have only used twice. FYI if you need to buy Brew Rite 4 cup coffee filters they are much cheaper at Walmart. I'm sorry that Amazon has such a higher price on the coffee pot. It's always been my impression that Amazon has fair pricing. Odie
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: Good for one!
customer_reviews.text: This little beauty I have been looking for forever. It comes with a timer, it lets you pour without spilling, keeps your coffee hot, and what I think is the best feature, that might sound weird is the backlighting of the clock. Now there are other small and larger coffee pots that have timers, however, they are not backlit so you cannot see the time. It's small, does what it's supposed to, and easy to clean. It was worth every dollar and I am so glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Jazi One

customer_reviews.title: ... have been buying cheaper coffee pots that have worked better. The canister leaks when I pour the water ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying cheaper coffee pots that have worked better. The canister leaks when I pour the water in and when I pour my coffee in the cup. I wish I had kept the box, so I could send it back. I have had the same problem with Mr. Coffee products before, but was hoping that they may have gotten it right by now. None of the reviews I read mentioned this problem. It also doesn't keep the coffee hot very long. I haven't timed it, but I wake up 2 hours before I leave for work and it's turned off before I leave out the door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mr. coffee simple brew 5 cup programmable coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase Mr. coffee coffee makers they’ve been around for years and are reliable. This 5 cup actually makes 2 good 8oz ounce cups of coffee and since I’m the only one that drinks it in my family it’s perfect for me. The best feature is the LED light Is green and you can see it at night when you’re in the kitchen. It is easy to set and to program.
customer_reviews.author: K.Edge

customer_reviews.title: Good but older versions were better
customer_reviews.text: I like the coffee pot overall. Good for those one to two coffee mug type of users. What i dont like is the glass container. I have an older version (about 2 years ago) and the thickness of the glass and the plastic that covers it had great quality. This product feels like once tap on your office desk and it will break. I still recommend the coffee pot, but use caution when using the glass pot.
customer_reviews.author: RDExpert

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is warm not HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just the photo, but it doesn't keep the coffee hot. It is a good size. But, I am not satisfied that I the coffee is warm.
customer_reviews.author: qnsgrl

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: this coffee pot fits my needs perfectly! Mr. Coffee a brand i'm familiar with and trust, perfect size for one person (girlfriend doesnt drink coffee) with a preset timer/ delay brew so i can set it for 5am the night before and just get up fill my tumbler and GO! auto shutoff is a good feature to have too. even though its only a 5 cup brewer, the coffee tray still takes the full size 8-12 cup paper filters just fine. this thing is a rockstar! so happy i found this before i bought a 12 cup or a cheap 4 cup that you would find out a crappy motel. is there a 6 star rating?
customer_reviews.author: i buy stuff

customer_reviews.title: Clock is extremly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the worst electric appliances I have ever purchased in my life... The digital clock is behind approx. 20 min every hour ! That means that every 24 hours the clock is 5 hours behind... So obviously the delay option is USELESS ! In addition to open the top cover were the filter is a battle to open as well and during operation it doesn't close properly due to the heat. In short it is a waste of money ! This is the first time and last time I buy a "Mr. Coffee" appliance !!!!
customer_reviews.author: YGH

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this coffee maker a couple days shy of 2 weeks and already it's broken. The little piece that controls the flow of water from the water well to the pot broke off in the dishwasher and there's no fixing it. Without that piece, there is no way to control the flow of water out of the coffee maker and water/coffee/coffee grounds pours out all over the counter. I'm so disappointed. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: GranMajesty

customer_reviews.title: Weak and grounds
customer_reviews.text: I thought the reviews claiming the coffee was weak was because folks were using the wrong grind. Nope. It’s weak, and after three tries there are grounds in the pot and every cup. I wish I could return it but I moved and threw away the box.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: A great little coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: A great coffee maker. It is very intuitive to set. I love that it is a small capacity, yet still has a delay-start timer and auto shut off. I like that you can sneak a cup mid-brew, however it always leaks several drops onto the hotplate. It is also a bit difficult to pour the water into the reservoir from the carafe, I need to contort a bit and always manage to spill some. Those are minor inconveniences, however. I like this coffee maker and would recommend it. I also suggest getting a reusable filter.
customer_reviews.author: booklover777

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.  Don't bother trying to understand timer instructions, though.
customer_reviews.text: I broke the carafe in my old 5-cup Mr. Coffee that did not have a timer, and replacement carafes cost as much as a new one. So I figured I'd try one of these programmable ones, and if I didn't like it, at least I'd have a new carafe. Figuring out how to set the timer so it makes coffee while you sleep was a bit challenging, as the instructions were written by space aliens. But luckily everyone else has the same problem so a google search turned up the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B

customer_reviews.title: Great size, great features.
customer_reviews.text: After several 4 and 5 cup makers, this model has some improved features. Wider water pouring opening makes it easier to fill without spilling. The LED screen is actually visible unlike other models. Only negative is the cost of a replacement carafe. Yes, chipped the glass carafe already! Luckily an older stainless 5 cup carafe fits wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Everything you wanted in one small coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot is everything I wished for and I searched high and low for this. The only negative about this and other people spoke of this problem also, is that the stem that you press down to pour your coffee is too short and because of that you can burn your thumb and bill water when you are filling it up and spill coffee when you were pouring it. I honestly didn't think it would be such a big deal but it really is. Other than that I adore this. I do see the price went up since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker for the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I replaced a more expensive brand coffee maker with this Mr. Coffee model. It’s just so simple to use and clean and I got tired of my other maker constantly telling me I needed to clean it. This one is simple, straightforward, ad makes a tasty pot of coffee. If you just want an easy pot of coffee and no nonsense, this is the maker for you. Just an off/on switch and a timer. Comes out nice and hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Grammo

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like burned plastic
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I ran water through it for the first time and my whole kitchen smelled like burned plastic. I did the same thing several times and the smell persisted. I am very disappointed with this product. Definitely returning it.
customer_reviews.author: sheyda

customer_reviews.title: It was broken in shipment and I didn't notice
customer_reviews.text: This little coffee maker works like a charm even when it is cracked in shipment. It is easy to clean and I only use bottled water in it to keep the water chamber as clean as possible. The grounds cup is easy to brush out and it makes my cup of Kona in the morning just fine. I didn't realize it was cracked until I was wiping down the outside of the machine and just happened to see the crack in the clear plastic. Ah Well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three stars because the carafe slops water everywhere
customer_reviews.text: My last Mr Coffee broke after 13 months, the warranty being for 12. I've had this one less than a month so time will tell if there is a built in fail. The old carafe design was fine, something I only appreciate in retrospect after having to be so careful pouring water into the tank with this one. Someone needs to go back to product design school.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Well priced and good features
customer_reviews.text: This was a well priced replacement for the earlier one I had for 8 years. It's great to be able to program it ahead and also love the auto shut off, so I don't burn the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok for the price, I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap. It drips onto heating pad every time I remove pot during brewing-even though it says you can do this-leaving coffee stained marks to wash off every time I use it..
customer_reviews.author: Michele M. Ziny

customer_reviews.title: A safe, easy to use, coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Our old Mr. Coffee 4 cup unit finally gave up after many years of daily use. We purchased this 5 cup model and are very pleased with it. I particularly like that the delay feature has to be set each time the delay feature is used. It won't come on automatically when we are away.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Worked OK, but no replacement carafes available!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit about 2 months ago and it worked just fine - until I dropped the carafe and broke it. I checked on the Mr. Coffee website and they don't carry replacement carafes fpr this model any more, rendering my unit completely useless. I'll by my next unit from a different brand with a stainless steel carafe.
customer_reviews.author: fronobulax

customer_reviews.title: Drips, dribbles, and makes a mess
customer_reviews.text: (1) The carafe dribbles water when you try to fill the tank -- unless you go painfully slow. (2) If you try to pour a cup while coffee is still brewing, coffee does NOT stop flowing and creates puddles in middle and on side of hotplate. (3) Even after the brewing has finished, it dribbles additional mess onto the hotplate when you remove carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Soule

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a 12-cup and cracking older coffee pot. It works but it isn’t great. Pros: It is easy to program and makes just enough for my husband and I. Cons: It’s super slow to brew. It also claims it is able to pause mid-brew to fill a cup but this feature hasn’t worked great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient size
customer_reviews.text: I love this little coffee maker. especially when I dont feel like making a big pot , and or want pod coffee .....The only thing is when you pour the coffee ,a little coffee always seem to dribble from these miniature caraffs other than that I love it !
customer_reviews.author: virginia l cregier

customer_reviews.title: Small, Quick brew. Auto shut-off
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for a large, 20 oz cup of coffee. Brews and keeps coffee hot. Auto shut-off shuts off in about 1 hour. The only thing that would make it better is if it were available in glass and stainless steel. No plastic parts.
customer_reviews.author: Camper at Heart

customer_reviews.title: I love it except it drips when it pours
customer_reviews.text: The 5 cup size is great! Makes two 15 oz mugs of coffee. My only complaint is that it drips from the decanter unless you pour very very slowly. I like it enough that I just mop up the drips but its a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Itsy bitsy, teenie weenie.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is so tiny, regular filters don’t really fit in it. When you put in 4 cups of water, it doesn’t even make a full cup. It’s described as a 6 cup pot, but it only has 5 cup measuring on the carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheaply made. After a week, clock display for the 4 in the minutes wasn't working properly making it hard to read. A few weeks later, the delayed vs. off and on buttons don't always work and I have to unplug and reset machine a few times a week. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: SophinetteHewitt

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one that blew a fuse and for my wife who English is a second language and best thing it’s simple enough for her to use but we don’t need the timer but it’s nice to have clock.
customer_reviews.author: Garye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: We generally use our Keurig, but every fall a local store grinds pumpkin spice coffee my wife likes. So we got this just for “her” coffee. it works just fine and I’ll admit I like “her” coffee, too!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite coffee pot. It’s inexpensive and works great. Plus I can make just one mug of coffee and don’t have the plastic waste that goes with the pods. Better for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a single friend, she enjoys a couple cups of coffee in the am and she just loves it to pieces. She thinks it's the best and cutest appliance she owns.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months! Inside part MELTED!
customer_reviews.text: The temp gets so hot inside that this part melted leaving the coffeemaker unusable and seemingly unfixable only 5 months after purchase. We only use the coffee pot about 1x a week so we’ve only used it maybe 20 times total. Save your money and purchase something nicer, especially if you want it to last longer than 20 uses. ☕️😭 Happy Monday to us!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S

customer_reviews.title: water runs before heat does
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really hold 5 8 oz cups; maybe 4 normal coffee cups. Needs filters sold separately. Did sorta OK but messy on water leaking.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: small and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot has a small footprint, all the auto-things you need, and seems to do a good, basic job. We are. very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MEK

customer_reviews.title: Java right on time !
customer_reviews.text: It's a blessing to have coffee ready when I wake up. The pot top is really narrow so it's hard to get your hands in to clean. Other than that and the fact that Amazon lost my order it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Dribble, Dribble, Dribble
customer_reviews.text: I had the 4-cup version of this and loved it. On this one, 5-cup version, the pot is redesigned. It dribbles every time I use it. When I fill it with water and when I pour my coffee. Also, the filter on this drips a lot too. I did not have any of these issues with the 4-cup. Very disappointing and very annoying issues because it happens every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H

customer_reviews.title: Great Dorm Coffee Maker!
customer_reviews.text: My college aged daughter wanted coffee in her apartment to avoid the coffee house expense, she can set the brew time to be ready for her 8:00a.m. class, and this pot shuts off automatically after two hours if she forgets! Win.Win.Win!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is great! It does everything it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Had a 4 cup mr coffee pot for twelve years! Hope this one last that long easy straight forward! Makes the perfect amount to fill my travel and have a cup while I wait for the car to warm up!
customer_reviews.author: S. Rudie

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use & tell how full the water reservoir is
customer_reviews.author: Peedees

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful coffee maker for two
customer_reviews.text: We use this coffee maker for our coffee. Easy to set up to delay
customer_reviews.author: Marfra

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well but it is very small, even for a 5-cup
customer_reviews.author: April Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Makes 5 cups of coffee, which is what I drink in a day. Has a clock, and automatically turns itself off if unattended. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Coffee maker great pitcher leaks when pouring
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker was excellent and the timer. Unfortunately when you pour the coffee there’s an issue with the picture and it leaks I bought one for my mom and hers did the same! They need to fix this problem before I order this again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Just enough for two
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use, not sure about durability because I haven't had it long enough. I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Tary

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June 2019, stopped working today, November 2, 2019. Very frustrating that it was only good for 4.5 months. Wasn’t a bad machine during the time I had it, simple enough to use. However, it just didn’t function for very long. Will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Vol Girl

customer_reviews.title: Makes coffee
customer_reviews.text: It makes coffee, not much else to say about it
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 10/25/19. Worked great till April 27, 2020. It no longer works. Very disappointed with the durability of this coffee maker. I had a Black and Decker that lasted more than 20 years prior to this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for personal use
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is simple to use, looks cool and is the perfect size for my personal use every morning
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ravenscroft

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 82 year old aunt. It was just what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlenejones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love my Mr Coffee. I did buy the hard coffee filter.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Mark

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it for it has auto time for off
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Richard: family-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Solid Machine
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as my old one did. Solid little machine. Delayed Timer works well too!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Machado

customer_reviews.title: Make coffee
customer_reviews.text: Makes my coffee in the morning. Love the delayed brew
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Scott

customer_reviews.title: second one I have bought/
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the one had because I liked it but died after several years.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working. It brews my wake up juice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super simple
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. Super simple, easy, basic coffee maker
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 1 coffee drinker household
customer_reviews.text: this is a great small coffee maker. i only want a 24 ounce mug's worth to take to work with me, and on weekends it's 2 good mugs. it's very tasty, and it pours and cleans very easily as the lid is removable for cleaning. it's got a very small footprint on the counter and the delayed brewing feature works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA M DOBMEIER

customer_reviews.title: A true Mr Coffee
customer_reviews.text: No the first I have had but lives up to its name.
customer_reviews.author: pab

customer_reviews.title: Customize strength
customer_reviews.text: Makes about 2.5 10 oz mugs. Love the 1 hr auto turn off feature. Hotter and better tasting than a Keurig and far less costly. Can mix decaf with regular if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Frances M.

customer_reviews.title: Best little pot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband for work. He uses it daily and loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Micki1998

customer_reviews.title: broke just after warranty expired....will not buy Mr. Coffee products again.
customer_reviews.text: My second Mr. Coffee pot that broke just after warranty expired....ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Meri Jo Warner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean and doesn't take a large amount of space.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for one person in the morning. No wasted coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Marie

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee 5-cup coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this coffee maker at first, I only had it a few days when it completely quit working, though. The light was on when I pushed "on" but the water would not cycle through. So, it was kind of nice while it lasted and I ended up going to Walmart and getting another 5-cup coffee maker in another brand for about the same price. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M. G.

customer_reviews.title: Coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. It was what I wanted, but it isn’t working right. Some time it doesn’t get the water hot. I don’t like cold coffee, so I’ll have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Prater

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for, a small, simple, coffee maker. I love how simple it is and it gets the job done. However, I do think it is a little pricey for how small it is but overall I like using it.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Just right for o e person
customer_reviews.text: Provides just the right amout of coffee for one person. The automatic feature wss a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. Dependably has my coffee ready for me at 6am every morning. Bought it for the small size and auto-brew setting and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this coffee maker. It takes an hour to make one cup of coffee, and thats refilling the water that spills out everywhere. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Adequate coffee maker. Takes 2 hands to hold it down to pull open the top.
customer_reviews.author: S. LeBarnes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: This economical little coffee maker is perfect for making one or two cups of coffee every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Takahashi

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow perfect . im in love with it , the coffee is very hot!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fontanez

customer_reviews.title: Two-Mug Morning Coffee
customer_reviews.text: this 5 cup coffee maker provides exactly the right amount of coffee each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Small size, big quality.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an RV so saving space is paramount. This provides all the function of a larger coffee make while saving space. Perfect for bachelors or tiny living people.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bilderback

customer_reviews.title: Junk and inconsiderate
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. The handle swivel cracked when I washed it the first time. EVEN worse: they were too cheap to include a few .$02 filters - you can't even use it without going to a store!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Piece of Crap
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of junk. Clock failed after two months, the entire thing failed a month later. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: michael grudgings

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I read the bad reviews on Amazon and other sites but I ignored them thinking that this is MR. COFFEE. They are a solid company and they've been around for a long time. I bought this coffee maker in January 2011 and it died in April 2011. This would be the perfect coffee maker for two people - IF IT WORKED.
customer_reviews.author: C. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: When I get a refund or exchange
customer_reviews.text: Not happy this item doesn’t make coffee hot been complaining for a month for a exchange
customer_reviews.author: Toni Brunette

customer_reviews.title: good thing.
customer_reviews.text: It is 3 years old and now wont brew coffee. Turn it on and it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: GregoryWarrenGalloway

customer_reviews.title: Small Cup
customer_reviews.text: Its really nice to have just a small cup coffee pot, and have a programmable one is even better. I had one of this exact model that lasted for YEARS before if was finally got tired and decided to quit. I had been searching for awhile before I finally decided to check Amazon and there is was. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: L. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Fast and hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for 2 mugs. Fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Robin Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: New better design!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for years. Best design yet. Also the time is now backlit! Huge improvement
customer_reviews.author: Frederick A. Aspenleiter

customer_reviews.title: terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking it would last a long time because it was a mr.coffee product but burned up after 1 week,it could be I received a defective product because I usually have no problem with mr. coffee coffee makers
customer_reviews.author: bigguy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The plastic elbow that controls the water broke off within one month of purchase. DON'T PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: kcclarke

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be better!
customer_reviews.text: Coffee runs down the side of the carafe when pouring, needs better designed spout.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Carafe breaks easaly, replacements are not availabe on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The carafe broke within about a month. Replacements are not available on Amazon. I've got to buy a new machine (:
customer_reviews.author: Bristol40

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee great product for size & price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The size is perfect for anyone with limited counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Young

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Straight Out of Box
customer_reviews.text: 1st & 2nd boxes came damaged. Photo speaks for itself. Didn’t even bother open coffee maker. Looks used & abused! Have an unboxing video of first order but family member doesn’t want to show face.
customer_reviews.author: Jester R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold 5 cups.
customer_reviews.text: This says "5 cups" but is tiny. Last I looked 1 cup is 8 ounces. This carafe holds about 2 8 ounce cups.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s simple easy and cheap. Just like the coffee I like. I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee 5-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect little coffee maker for anyone who doesn't drink a lot of coffee. It fits nicely on even a small counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My lil Brother loves it!!!!Easy to use and with a timer

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to open the top

product_meta.title: Mr. Coffee Simple Brew 5-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker, Black - CGX7-RB
product_meta.description: Color:Limited EditionThe classic functionality of Mr. Coffee's Simple Brew 5-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker helps you make rich-tasting, expertly brewed coffee without stress or mess. Enable the Delay Brew feature to schedule a brewing cycle first thing in the morning, so you can wake up to that invigorating aroma and start your day off right. Should you need a cup before the brew cycle is finished, Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause is a lifesaver. It stops brewing so you can pour freely, and then finishes the brewing cycle after you place the carafe back in position. The Simple Brew also features a removable basket filter that lifts out for quick and easy filling and cleaning. Whether you want a single cup or 5, this no-fuss automatic coffee maker will deliver the goods, time after time.
feature_bullets: Delay Brew timer lets you brew ahead of time, so you can wake up to fresh-brewed coffee
Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause stops cycle if you need a cup before brewing is finished
Dual water window allows visibility as you fill—no more overflows
Removable filter basket for quick and easy cleanup
1-Hour Shut Off automatically powers coffee maker down so you don't have to
